attributes.action: NEVER allow organ donation to be an OPT-OUT decision.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If organ donation is OPT-OUT, it is possible that your organ donation OPT-OUT card, could be lost in an accident, or even be stolen by someone with ulterior motives. It is a fundamental right to have your body remain intact after death. It is not a fundamental right for others to share your body parts.
